abstract: Several large private equity firms submitted first-round bids for Home Depot‘s HD Supply unit, but Home Depot may not be all that interested in selling the unit, according to The Deal.com. When the company said in February that it was considering strategic alternatives, HD Supply was seen as a distraction to Home Depot’s core business. But with the housing market slowing dramatically in recent months, analysts now say the unit, which is less reliant on the residential housing market, could help the retailer weather the housing storm.
lead_paragraph: Several large private equity firms submitted first-round bids for Home Depot‘s HD Supply unit, but Home Depot may not be all that interested in selling the unit, according to The Deal.com. When the company said in February that it was considering strategic alternatives, HD Supply was seen as a distraction to Home Depot’s core business. But with the housing market slowing dramatically in recent months, analysts now say the unit, which is less reliant on the residential housing market, could help the retailer weather the housing storm.

headline.main: Home Depot May Change Its Mind on Unit Sale
